casebody.data:
No. 10-7049. Antoine Jerome Pettiford, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1055, 131 S. Ct. 620,

178 L. Ed. 2d 454,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8875. November 15, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 612 F.3d 270.
